nodes.bodyText: I would call them VOTE_BOOK_ON/OFF for consistency.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: VOTE("vote") -- similar to PICKER, when we have a GUI for settings we'll explain it.

I decided to use vote_book since it was a bit more descriptive than just vote. Like toggling the "picker" is a bit more obvious than toggling "vote".
I can still change it if you wish
I've been trying to keep setting keys a single word :)
